bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: Test new label bot; jupyter bug
bug.description:
See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/code-intelligence/issues/70>kubeflow/code-intelligence#70</denchmark-link>
This is a test issue to see if the new label microservice is working. Lets pretend we have a major bug with jupyter notebooks. Lets imagine the server crashes everytime we start a notebook. This would be a big problem.

comments.comment:
Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the labels:
Label Probability
area/jupyter 0.75
kind/bug 0.95
Please mark this comment with or to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-botdata/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Success the new label bot was invoked and an area label was applied.
